title: Daughter of Darkness
tags: journey to the house of grief
find a way into the cloister
content: ed; the discovery of such a piece bolstered her hopes of uncovering further signs of a Dark Justiciar presence. We entered the ruins of what may have been a fortress dedicated to the goddess Shar. We could be close to the Dark Justiciar's lair. We found the corpses of several Dark Justiciars - Shar must have been worshipped here. Shadowheart suggested we search for answers. We found traces of Hellish fiends. Could they have killed the Dark Justiciars? If so, where is their temple of Shar? We gif
